name: Firefox 4 Maximized Appmenu Button As Tab
description:
This style makes the appmenu button resemble a pinned tab only when window is maximized.

Tested in Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0 ID:20110318052756

Notes: 
       WFM in Windows 7. Don't leave me a bad review because it doesn't work on your Mac.
       Cycle window(restore/maximize) after applying style
